ygData.subject: newbie faq
ygData.msgSnippet: hello everyone, i am not sure if this already exists, but is there a newbie FAQ availible? we could collect those links, and put them in the groups link
ygData.messageBody:
hello everyone,

i am not sure if this already exists, but is there a newbie FAQ
availible? we could collect those links, and put them in the groups
link section, or collect them in a file.

maybe we can make a FAQ/guide here, as we have old and new
players in this group. the new players can collect the answers, and
we older ones try to give suitable answers. maybe add some
examples for, how to find your guild leader, doing the first fights,
interact with a merchant, or how to find and do quests.

i had a very nice guide to blacksmithing, with screenshots of all
important items. i hope i still find my printed copy, because the
site it was one, went offline about two years ago. but i loved the
style of this guide. some pictures and some text, not too much
of either ... and somehow smithing got easy ... well, without the
needed plat, it was still pretty painful to do anything at all ;-)


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
Delaney Arianwen, level 51 female high-elf cleric
Latrodectus Mactans - Tarew Marr
